short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Duolingo to support some features like: remove tournament board, short-cut in practice and more...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on extension icon in toolbar to update setting of extension.

Add up some features when access Duolingo exam: change dashboard UI, add shortcuts in dashboard, exam and story context.

Note:
This extention will make your learning more difficult with no hints any more and you must use keyboard to enter answer without vocabularies.

---

** Keyboard Shortcuts **

* Exam Context

`Digit Keyboard`: to select on selectable buttons correspondingly in exam context.

`Esc`: To ignore the current question.

`Ctrl + Space`: To make Duo speaking again current sentence.

* Home Context

`Shift + L`: start entering next lesson.

`Shift + P`: start entering practice (to recover hearts).

`Alt + Shift + Q`: start entering story.

---

* Only show custom panel for your EXP and spent study time today

* See config options of this extension for more options

* Automatic shortcuts for wordbanks and other elements

* Auto-click "Next" button for more focus on the exam

-------
